content:
# The new furnace is currently processing 1 unit of iron ore after I added the last remaining piece. 
# My inventory before the final extraction shows:
# - 5 coal
# - 5 stone
# - 2 iron ore
# - 3 iron plates
# - 5 iron gear wheels

# I will now wait for the furnace to finish smelting the last iron ore into an iron plate. 
# I will monitor the furnace for the next 30 seconds to see if it produces any output.

for _ in range(30):
    if inspect_inventory(new_furnace)[Prototype.IronPlate] >= 1:  # Check if any iron plates have been produced
        break
    sleep(1)
else:
    raise Exception("Smelting timeout - check fuel and inputs")

# After waiting, I will extract the iron plate produced from the furnace.
crafted_plates = extract_item(Prototype.IronPlate, new_furnace.position, quantity=5)  # Extract produced iron plates
print(f"Extracted Iron Plates from new furnace: {crafted_plates}")
print(f"Final Furnace status: {inspect_inventory(new_furnace)}")  # Check the furnace status after extraction
print(f"Final Inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Confirm total iron plates in the inventory after extraction
